thumb.title: 夢見るAIの歌 - Forgot to Lock the Door [MV]
thumb.description: (Intro)Last night was secret, felt so turned on,Roamed through the parties, where the girls have all gone.Lesbian night scenes, but I had no luck,Came back to my shared room, tired and horny.Too exhausted to think, I fell into bed,Wet dreams swirling in my head.(Verse 1)I woke up late, rushed through the day,Didn't think twice, my mind in a haze.Shared room, close quarters, you know the deal,But I made a mistake, one I can't conceal.(Pre-Chorus)It was a lazy afternoon, the sun sinking low,I thought I was alone, but little did I know.Turned on the plasma, the sixty-inch screen,Two women kissing, oh, what a scene!(Chorus)Forgot to lock the door, oh, what a shame,My roommate walked in, and now it's a game.She thinks I want her, can't meet her eyes,Embarrassment so big, it touches the skies.(Verse 2)She froze at the doorway, eyes wide in shock,I scrambled for the remote, but couldn't make it stop.Her cheeks turned red, my heart beat fast,An awkward silence, how long could it last?
